 2021-04112021-05-19,  ,  PMO, 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of MURIELLE HENRI, full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Ottawa District Office), for the period she is acting as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Ottawa District Office), effective November 16, 2020, until such time as she is no longer required to act as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Ottawa District Office).
